definitions: the quality of being hot; high temperature

examples.text: though it was quite as hot in the tent as in the house it was a very different sort of hotness
the astronauts are carefully balanced between the cold darkness of space and the burning hotness of the sun

definitions: the quality of being sexually attractive or alluring

examples.text: there's something about a man with a guitar slung over his shoulder that just oozes hotness

definitions: a spicy quality in food that produces a burning sensation in the mouth

examples.text: the yoghurt and cucumber will counteract the hotness of the curry
the reason for the chili's hotness lies in a chemical called capsaicin

shortDefinitions: spicy quality in food that produces burning sensation in mouth
